TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerActionPropertyItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerActionPropertyItem Inherits DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示与从 派生的类中的属性相关的面板项。

span.span: Represents a panel item that is associated with a property in a class derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示智能标记面板中的各个项。The class represents individual items in a smart tag panel. 每个项是通常与由派生类中的属性相关联类，并由组件作者提供。Each item is typically associated with a property in a class that is derived from the class and supplied by the component author. 存储中，不再关联属性的名称通过属性。The association is maintained through the name of the property, as stored in the property. 各个面板项相关联在一起以形成一个面板，通过调用方法的类。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by a call to the method of the class. 若要显示关联属性的值，该属性必须具有`get`访问器方法; 若要允许编辑，该属性必须具有`set`访问器方法。To display the value of the associated property, that property must have a `get` accessor method; to allow editing, the property must have a `set` accessor method. 在面板允许直接编辑的用户的属性项的方式取决于存在可用于关联的属性的数据类型支持的类型信息。The way in which the panel allows direct editing of a property item by the user depends on the supporting type information present for the data type of the associated property. 下表显示了可能的方案。The following table shows the likely scheme. |属性类型信息Property type information|编辑用户界面 (UI) 的属性项Property item editing user interface (UI)| |-------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------| |具有关联的类型编辑器 ()Has an associated type editor ()|与基础属性关联的类型编辑器显示用于编辑属性的值。The type editor associated with the underlying property is displayed for editing the property's value.| |具有已知类型关联的类型转换器 ()Has an associated type converter to a known type ()|已知类型的类型编辑器显示用于编辑属性的值。The type editor for the known type is displayed for editing the property's value. 例如，为的类型转换器很可能显示。For example, a type converter to will likely display a .| |布尔值Boolean value|使用二进制 UI，例如复选标记来显示项。The item is displayed using a binary UI, such as a check mark.| |以上均不是。None of the above.|项显示为使用的数据类型的非可编辑的文本字符串方法。The item is displayed as a non-editable text string using the data type's method.| 所有基本类型，如，也是常见[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]数据类型，如，提供标准的类型转换器和编辑器。All fundamental types, such as , and common [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] data types, such as , supply standard type converters and editors. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)或[通用类型转换](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)。For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) or [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada). 有关类型的编辑器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现 UI 类型编辑器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed961fb9-ee02-4666-b511-05f3204bb75c)。For more information about type editors, see [How to: Implement a UI Type Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed961fb9-ee02-4666-b511-05f3204bb75c). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数设置并属性设置为`null`。The constructor sets the and properties to `null`. `memberName`参数引用的关联是派生自的程序员提供的类的成员的属性名称类。The `memberName` parameter refers to the name of the associated property that is a member of the programmer-supplied class derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 详细了解如何`category`参数用于在面板上的项进行分组，请参阅方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. `memberName`参数引用的关联是派生自的程序员提供的类的成员的属性名称类。The `memberName` parameter refers to the name of the associated property that is a member of the programmer-supplied class derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). summary.span: 获取与此项关联的属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that this item is associated with.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含关联属性的名称。

span.span: A that contains the name of the associated property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的属性 — 从派生类中类-此项应绑定到。The property specifies which property—in the class derived from the class—the item should be bound to. 当程序员与通过用户界面 (UI) 的面板项交互时，将设置此关联的属性。When the programmer interacts with the panel item through the user interface (UI), this associated property will be set. 在构造函数中设置。 is set in the constructor. 其值是区分大小写。Its value is case-sensitive.

summary.span: 获取或设置将其项供给当前面板的组件。

span.span: Gets or sets a component that contributes its items to the current panel.

value.span: 供给组件，该组件应具有提供 对象的关联设计器。

span.span: The contributing component, which should have an associated designer that supplies objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性，另一个组件可以有助于使其拉出模型面板项的当前列表。With the property, another component can lend its pull-model panel items to the current list. 例如，用户控件可能聚合对象从一个或多个其构成控件。For example, a user control might aggregate the objects from one or more of its constituent controls. 此属性的工作原理与结合属性。This property works in conjunction with the property.
